00033 #include "batterychargerabout.h"

00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 BatteryChargerAbout::BatteryChargerAbout(AcqUnit* u,
00042           QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent)
00043 {
00044     unit = u;
00046     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.setupUi(this);
00047     setupGUI();
00048 }
00049 
00050 BatteryChargerAbout::~BatteryChargerAbout()
00051 {
00052 }
00053 
00054 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 void BatteryChargerAbout::on_closeButton_clicked()
00059 {
00060     accept();
00061 }
00062 
00063 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 void BatteryChargerAbout::setupGUI()
00071 {
00072     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.boardIDLabel->
00073                               setText(QString("Board ID: %1")
00074                               .arg(unit->getBoardID(),2,16,QLatin1Char('0')));
00075     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.cpuFreqLabel->
00076                               setText(QString("CPU Frequency: %1 MHz")
00077                               .arg((int)(unit->getCpuFreq()/1000),2,10));
00078     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.cpuTypeLabel->
00079                               setText(QString("CPU Type: %1")
00080                               .arg(unit->getMCUDescriptor()));
00081     unsigned int numberChannels = unit->getNumberChannels();
00082     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelALabel->
00083                           setText(QString("Battery Voltage Channel Not Configured"));
00084     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelBLabel->
00085                           setText(QString("Load Current Channel Not Configured"));
00086     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelCLabel->
00087                           setText(QString("Panel Voltage Channel Not Configured"));
00088     BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelDLabel->
00089                           setText(QString("Panel Current Channel Not Configured"));
00090     for (uint channel = 0; channel < numberChannels; channel++)
00091     {
00092         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* channelAUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,channel);
00093         BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelALabel->
00094                               setText(QString("Battery Voltage Precision: %1")
00095                               .arg(channelAUnit->getAdcPrecision()));
00096         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* channelBUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,channel);
00097         BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelBLabel->
00098                               setText(QString("Load Current Precision: %1")
00099                               .arg(channelBUnit->getAdcPrecision()));
00100         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* channelCUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,channel);
00101         BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelCLabel->
00102                               setText(QString("Panel Voltage Precision: %1")
00103                               .arg(channelCUnit->getAdcPrecision()));
00104         AcqSimpleAdcUnit* channelDUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,channel);
00105         BatteryChargerAboutDialogUi.channelDLabel->
00106                               setText(QString("Panel Current Precision: %1")
00107                               .arg(channelDUnit->getAdcPrecision()));
00108     }
00109 }
